metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8089 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: SQL injection vulnerability in Zend Framework before 1.12.9, 2.2.x before 2.2.8, and 2.3.x before 2.3.3, when using the sqlsrv PHP extension, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via a null byte.

criterions.comment: zend-framework: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
